name: Duplicado!
description:
Avocados have fallen all over the orchard!
Slide the pieces around the board and get every last seed planted to solve a nearly-endless landscape full of unique and challenging puzzles.

GAMEPLAY:
It's simple: plant every seed to solve the puzzle.
It starts out easy enough, but watch out because these puzzles get TRICKY.
Use the 4 avocado piece-types and their unique sliding mechanics to plant all of the seeds into the soil and water tiles. Some seemingly easy levels will have you completely stumped until you get a very satisfying 'Aha!' moment where you find the solution.

EXPERIENCE:
After a short collection of tutorial levels, the game loads you immediately into an endless landscape of procedurally-generated puzzles that flow beautifully into each other upon solving. As you complete levels you will unlock three additional difficulty tiers that offer more challenging puzzles.

UI:
The minimalistic UI distracts only with the essentials: the oft-needed reset and undo buttons, a convenient settings menu, and a puzzle-sharing button that lets you send level-codes to a friend.

We hope this game offers peaceful little moments when you need them most.
Happy puzzling :)


origin story: Jared randomly said "duplicado"... and thought we could make a fun game where you duplicate avocados. so we did.
